thread.title: Ole Miss says Nkemdiche has concussion, will not return
thread.title_full: Ole Miss says Nkemdiche has concussion, will not return

title: Ole Miss says Nkemdiche has concussion, will not return
text:
> Top News Ole Miss says Nkemdiche has concussion, will not return Mississippi defensive tackle Robert Nkemdiche (5) is checked on by referee Brad Rogers after Nkemdiche was injured on a play against Memphis in the first half of an NCAA college football game Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Memphis, Tenn. (AP Photo/Mark Humphrey)
